hero_subtitle_1: Genuine coffee from the heart of Africa
about_title: The Best Choice For your Business with over 6 Years of experience
about_text: Bender Export Ltd was founded in 2017 and is registered in Rwanda under the RDB Company code of 107432539. In addition to producing, processing and exporting coffee, we also offer services for renting construction & heavy equipment. In 2022, we started the pine timbers business to further our contribution to the social-economic development of our surrounding communities. These contributions have a life-changing impact on their daily lives.
